edge: Mihika needs to reach Delhi urgently for an important meeting with her husband.
Lara Dutta is playing the character of Mihika Banerjee in this movie.
Akshay Kumar is playing the character of Lt. Col. Vikram Rana in this movie.
Mihika is married to Lt. Col. Vikram Rana.
Mihika travels through Jhunjhunu District while going to Delhi due to the theft of her money.
The movie shows both large urban conglomerations and small rural areas like Nua, a small town in Rajasthan, that make up India.
Manu and Mihika travel together during their journey to Delhi due to the theft of Mihika's money.
Vinay Pathak is playing the character of Manu Gupta in this movie.
